title: Will Smith’s Oscar Slap Barely Mentioned In ‘SNL’s Cold Open As NBC Show Triples Down On Fox News, “Disney Vs. America” & Trump - Deadline
content:
1. Will Smith’s Oscar Slap Barely Mentioned In ‘SNL’s Cold Open As NBC Show Triples Down On Fox News, “Disney Vs. America” & Trump  Deadline
  2. How 'SNL' poked fun at Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars – again and again  USA TODAY
  3. The cancellations that weren’t: Will Smith isn’t being canceled, and neither are people who say the wrong thing in Hollywood  New York Daily News
  4. Will Smith's slap heard round the world forces us to imagine life free of transgressions against Black women  National Catholic Reporter
  5. Chris Rock owes an apology too, and other reactions to slap  Los Angeles Times

description: If you were expecting to hear a lot about Will Smith’s slap of Chris Rock at the Oscars on March 27, tonight’s Saturday Night Live cold open didn’t have a lot to offer. Sure, James Austin Johnson ‘…
